akwelye 1.0.0
  • Reference

Reference

All functions

EVAL()

Generate all candidates for a vector of input strings

count_sylls()

Count number of syllables in a candidate string

fconst_depc()

Assign a violation to every syllable in the output with an epenthetic onset consonant

fconst_ident_root()

Assign a violation if the transferred line-initial syllable was part of a line-final root form

fconst_max_v()

#' Assign a violation to every syllable in the output that was not in the input #' #' @export

fconst_no_transfer()

Assign a violation if the line-initial vowel in the input has been deleted in the output

gen_all_cands()

Generate all candidates for a vector of input strings

get_txtstgs_tbl()

Generate all rhythmically valid note combinations for n syllables

ipa_to_cand_str()

Convert transcriptions in IPA to working representations

mconst_al_pwd_bar()

Assign a violation to every prosodic word whose left edge is not aligned with the left edge of some bar

mconst_ar_lng_bar()

Assign a violation to every syllable (whose duration is greater than a quaver) which is not immediately followed by the right edge of a bar.

mconst_get_short()

Assign a violation where for every pair of consecutive bars, the number of syllables in the latter bar is not fewer than the number of syllables in the former bar.

mconst_no_four()

Assign a violation for every bar with 4 syllables in it

mconst_no_long()

Assign a violation where for every pair of consecutive bars, the number of syllables in the latter bar is greater than the number of syllables in the former bar.

mconst_onset()

Assign a violation to every onsetless syllable

mconst_pwd_in_bar()

Assign a violation to every bar which does not contain exactly one prosodic word
